q: 36, recently appeared on Jimmy Kimmel Live and spoke about his pal and former American Idol judge Simon Cowell 's upcoming show The X Factor. Asked if he had spoken to Simon Cowell about it, he said: Actually I did hear from him, I spoke to him when he was overseas on a little bit of a break and he didn't comment about the new show. "No he didn't bring up the new show. But he likes to keep his opinions to himself. However Ryan Seacrest said he is sure to hear from him if the show gets impressive ratings when it starts later this year. He said: "He will be the first to congratulate himself on

In his U.N. presentation, Colin Powell described it as Terrorist Poison and Explosive Factory, Khurmal. Donald Rumsfeld said Khurmal was operated by Ansar al-Islam, a Sunni militant group with ties to Abu Musab al-Zarqawi , a Jordanian extremist who later led the Iraq branch of the al-Qaida terrorist network. rest of the pack( cough, Idol, cough) is that talents as young as 12 can apply-and just as importantly for the late-bloomers out there, there is no upper age limit for contestants. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, Simon Cowell said. "I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent, and we are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million recording contract. I'm doing

a massive, massive risk, but also it's an incredible incentive," he said. "I also did it because I believe[ we] can find a star," Simon Cowell continued. So, I'm nervous, but I'm also confident that it was the right thing to do. I think it should be a life-changing prize. This is not a dressed-up 5 million. The British media mogul, who will also be serving as executive producer and a judge on the show, noted that the money will be paid out over five years, one million for each year,

We've touched just 1 percent of the capabilities that could be deployed in that realm, said Sergey Brin , who will head strategic projects and new products in the new management structure.
